description:
EndeavourOS ARM branch is in danger of going away forever due to lack of maintainers and the lack of recent changes in the upstream Arch Linux ARM project.

The post EndeavourOS Devs Say “Goodbye” to Their ARM Branch, Maintainers Needed appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: EndeavourOS Devs Say “Goodbye” to Their ARM Branch, Maintainers Needed
